displayProperties.description:
• Complete Crucible matches to earn Crucible Ranks. Winning or completing multiple matches in a row grants additional progress.

• Reach higher Competitive Divisions for a bonus multiplier to Crucible Ranks.

• Complete Ranks to earn Crucible Engrams.

• Earn Crucible weapons at the end of matches, in engrams, or from focusing more weapon perks as you complete up to 4 Rank resets in a Season.

displayProperties.description:
• Complete Vanguard activities to earn Vanguard Ops Ranks. Completing multiple activities in a row grants additional progress.

• Complete Nightfall activities to earn bonus Vanguard Ranks. Defeating all Champions within the Nightfall earns the most loot and highest multiplier.

• Use Vanguard scoring to earn Vanguard Rank multipliers based on the score attained.

• Complete Ranks to earn Vanguard Engrams.

• Earn Vanguard weapons at the end of matches, in engrams, or from focusing with more weapon perks as you complete up to 4 Rank resets in a Season.

• Each week, a different Nightfall weapon can be found by completing Nightfall activities; find Adept Nightfall weapons when completing Grandmaster Nightfall activities.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Ops
